paper_abstract: A full Nesterov-Todd step infeasible interior-point algorithm is proposed for solving linear programming problems over symmetric cones by using the Euclidean Jordan algebra. Using a new approach, we also provide a search direction and show that the iteration bound coincides with the best known bound for infeasible interior-point methods.
paper_title: NEW COMPLEXITY ANALYSIS OF A FULL NESTEROV-TODD STEP INFEASIBLE INTERIOR-POINT ALGORITHM FOR SYMMETRIC OPTIMIZATION
